sentence: The room was in need of repair I wish I had snap at picture
Also I am not stuck with the relentless maintenance fees and the difficulty getting a top resort when everyone else is trying to use their points
The dramatic decline in service and property maintenance is disheartening
Second and this is not something that can be changed without a major renovation the rooms have a teeny tiny stall shower but a huge non Jacuzi bathtub which nobody uses

When you couple that with the Cove owners newsletter that arrived this week along with the 2018 maintenance and damage fees you come away with a picture of significantly more damage and progress that is not moving too quickly given all the challenges to the island infrastructure
The property is 100 repaired after the two devastating hurricanes last year
Facilities were repaired or replaced and the employees are so friendly
Lots of the rooms have had some renovation or furniture replaced
My only significant long standing issue is that the maintenance fee per week has gone from 60 to over 230

The hotel is still not up and running since the hurricane 2 years ago but the Vacation Club Timeshare was and so we were able to rent a 2 bedroom villa which needed some updates but was spacious and had some nice amenities kitchen 2 bathrooms washer dryer
The resort was gorgeous and some villas were being remodeled
The young lady who worked the morning shifted at the market store towel people the ground keepers and maintenances were excellent workers and very nice friendly and polite
Condos are clean updated with lovely ocean views
The pool and pool deck area was in good repair and always clean
We were the first to stay in this villa after the renovation therefore it was immaculate
The villas are well appointed updated with all amenities
The resort is clean rooms have been refurbished and very spacious
The rooms were recently refurbished and with the exception of the hideaway couch nicely done
Beautiful views and the unit was recently updated with new furnishings and decor
We came to celebrate my husbands birthday at what we thought was a beautifully renovated upscale resort
